main_definition: To collect or bring together (people, things, information) in one place.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having collected a group of people for an event or purpose.
meanings_and_examples.example: The team gathered at the park to practice for their upcoming game.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To collect items from different places and bring them together in one location.
meanings_and_examples.example: She gathered all her laundry and placed it in a basket before taking it downstairs to be washed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To gather information or data for analysis or research purposes.
meanings_and_examples.example: The scientists gathered data from various sources to conduct their study on climate change.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Informally, 'to assemble' or come together in a group
meanings_and_examples.example: We all gathered at the local cafe for our weekly book club meeting.
